rep.text: I know what we can do!
My father taught me how to brew a potion that gives you immense power for a short time after you drink it. We can make it and he will not dare to deny your challenge...
Sounds like a plan. What do we need for the potion?
Hmmm... let me think... So we are to mix the bark of a dead tree, some yen root in a bowl. Brew some snake's tail, mix it all together and it should be it!.
Just need to find the ingredients then.
